resources.string:
Kris Hendrwan is a 26-year-old government politician who enjoys painting, jigsaw puzzles and hockey. He is inspiring and entertaining, but can also be very selfish and a bit unkind. 
He is an Indonesia Christian who defines himself as straight. He has a degree in philosophy, politics and economics. He has a severe phobia of snakes, and is obsessed with over\-knee socks. 
Physically, Kris is in pretty good shape. He is average\-height with olive skin, brown hair and black eyes. He has a pair of socks on his lower back. 
He grew up in a working class neighbourhood. His parents separated when he was small, but remained friends and provided a happy, stable home. 
He is currently single. His most recent romance was with an electrician called Rhianna Kimberley Myers, who was 9 years older than him. They broke up because Kris got fed up of being taken advantage of. 
Kris's best friend is a government politician called Gina O'Doherty. They get on well most of the time. He also hangs around with Elle Moss and Wesley Reynolds. They enjoy worship together.
